paper_abstract: An L-fuzzy generalization of the so-called Chu correspondences between formal contexts forms a category called L-ChuCors. In this work, we show that this category naturally embeds ChuCors and prove that it is *-autonomous. We also focus on the direct product of two L-fuzzy contexts, which is defined with the help of a binary operation, essentially a disjunction, on a lattice of truth-values L.
paper_title: The Category of L-Chu Correspondences and the Structure of L-Bonds
